Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to banning the discharge and use within the city of certain wastes associated with oil and natural gas production activities, including hydraulic fracturing
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Banning the discharge and use within the city of certain wastes associated with oil and natural gas production activities, including hydraulic fracturing.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the General Electric Corporation and the United States Environmental Protection Agency to enter into an agreement that expands the scope of the Hudson River PCBs remediation plan in order to address issues and concerns raised by the United States National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration, the United States Fish and Wildlife Service and affected communities, and to implement an expanded remediation plan immediately.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: General Electric Corporation and the United States Environmental Protection Agency to enter into an agreement that expands the scope of the Hudson River PCBs remediation plan.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to installing photovoltaic systems on city buildings
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Installing photovoltaic systems on city buildings.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to banning the discharge and use within the city of certain wastes associated with oil and natural gas production activities, including hydraulic fracturing
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: Banning the discharge and use within the city of certain wastes associated with oil and natural gas production activities, including hydraulic fracturing.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to installing photovoltaic systems on city buildings

Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Amended by Committee
Items.MatterName: Installing photovoltaic systems on city buildings.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the General Electric Corporation and the United States Environmental Protection Agency to enter into an agreement that expands the scope of the Hudson River PCBs remediation plan in order to address issues and concerns raised by the United States National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration, the United States Fish and Wildlife Service and affected communities, and to implement an expanded remediation plan immediately.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: General Electric Corporation and the United States Environmental Protection Agency to enter into an agreement that expands the scope of the Hudson River PCBs remediation plan.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to installing photovoltaic systems on city buildings
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Introduction be Approved by Committee approved by Roll Call.
